pullrequest.title: GetName() is deprecated, changed to Name()

content.raw:
You can checkout the gazebo8 branch:

`hg up gazebo8`

And take a look at the files you're planning to change.

For the tutorials, you can check the gazebo_tutorials repository. For example, here are the current versions for the tutorial you're trying to fix:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/25c6d4f4ee30a7355bc96989282a6c1e7e8e3235/plugins_world/?at=default

The fix for the tutorial would entail copying the Gazebo 7 tutorial into a new one and changing the code to point to Gazebo 8 instead.
content.html:
You can checkout the gazebo8 branch:

hg up gazebo8

And take a look at the files you're planning to change.

For the tutorials, you can check the gazebo_tutorials repository. For example, here are the current versions for the tutorial you're trying to fix:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/25c6d4f4ee30a7355bc96989282a6c1e7e8e3235/plugins_world/?at=default

The fix for the tutorial would entail copying the Gazebo 7 tutorial into a new one and changing the code to point to Gazebo 8 instead.
